{{Infobox Peripheral NOS |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Tableau TK8-R2 Forensic USB Bridge |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Tableau |model = T8-R2 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = rev 1.2.1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/13/2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Tableau T8-R2 |sernum = |wlclass = |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |if_connector_type = Female Mini-B |form_factor = |vendor_id = 13d7 |device_id = 000c |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:0E:CC |chip1 = NEC;µPD720102; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = see tables |flags = |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = write blocker |availability = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 2010 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00Q76X8X2 |asin_country = CA |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |manuf_country = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :[https://www2.guidancesoftware.com/products/Pages/tableau/products/forensic-bridges/t8-r2.aspx Product page] | [http://www.tableau.com Tableau site] *[[Tableau T8-R2]] is a "read-only" or "write-blocking" storage bridge, from USB Mass Storage, :to USB Mass Storage or IEEE 1394 SBP-2. It only recognises storage block size 512 octet. :This means, it cannot export any old USB optical burner (logical block size 2048 octet) into :a pseudo CD-ROM drive, and it does not work with "ATA advanced format" HDD enclosures. :Also be aware, it does not support [https://usb-ids.gowdy.us/read/UC/08/04 USB Floppy class (UFI)]. :It has one IEEE 1394 (6-pin) receptacle and one USB mini-b receptacle. :At best, throughput is approximately 31 Mo/s. :Its IEEE 1394 OUI is 00:0E:CC ([http://hwaddress.com/?q=00:0E:CC HWaddress]). *'''lsusb''' [[Tableau T8-R2/lsusb 007.out]] *'''crpp''' [[Tableau T8-R2/crpp v20160501.out]] {{SCollapse | IC and microchip package markings • >> |
